subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Such is the financial power of England’s Premier League that four of its teams are still in the Champions League competition. And such is fate that Liverpool and Chelsea will meet for the fifth year in a row in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Such is the financial power of England’s Premier League that four of its teams are still in the Champions League competition. And such is fate that Liverpool and Chelsea will meet for the fifth year in a row in the quarterfinals.
